title: Kundan Polki Stud Earrings - Emerald and Ruby Accents
materials: Kundan Polki Diamonds. Gold features a rich Hyderabadi Polish for an antique finish.
features: Intricate floral design inspired by traditional South Indian motifs. Features a central oval cut Emerald, surrounded by round-cut Rubies and encrusted with Kundan Polki diamonds to add a sparkling accent. Delicate gold filigree work enhances the overall aesthetic.
occasions: Perfect for daily wear or special occasions. Adds a touch of elegance for Seemantham
or other traditional celebrations. Equally suited for modern events like parties and gatherings.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans with generations of experience. The classic design features a timeless appeal which complements a variety of styles. Each gemstone is hand-selected for its color and clarity, ensuring exceptional quality. Makes a cherished heirloom piece.
